collectionInfo.name: Basic C Tutorial
collectionInfo.description: C is a general-purpose high level language that was originally developed by  for the Unix operating system.  C is a powerful, flexible, portable and elegantly structured programming language. It is independent of any particular machine architecture or operating system, which makes it easy to write portable programs.
